title: Please fix the rank
body: I was in my rank doing my placement and i cant log in nor log out because i will recieve penalty like RIOT please

replies.body:
We can't manually adjust ranks as it would upset the integrity of the entire ranking system altogether, but it does sound like you were having connection issues possibly which we can still troubleshoot to try and make sure this doesn't happen again. 

I'd first switch to an ethernet cord if at all possible to get the most stable connection you can, but it'd also be a good idea to update your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 to see if this could have been caused by bad network routing. Be sure to test these changes in a custom/practice game first to see how they work out, and let me know how it goes!
